identity.name: E1_Decant_Boutique
identity.target_audience: Young adults and adults in Mexico, perfume enthusiasts, luxury seekers on a budget

usage_rules: Use Playfair Display for all major headings (H1-H3).
Use Manrope for all body text, inputs, and UI elements.
Use Cinzel sparingly for 'Limited Edition' tags or price overlays.
Captions must be uppercase with wide tracking (0.2em).

grid_system.bento_marketing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-8 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-8
grid_system.product_grid: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-x-6 gap-y-12

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black hover:bg-[#F4CF57] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(212,175,55,0.4)]
buttons.outline: border border-white/20 text-white hover:border-[#D4AF37] hover:text-[#D4AF37] rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300 bg-transparent backdrop-blur-sm
buttons.ghost: text-white/70 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.product: group relative bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-[#D4AF37]/30 transition-all duration-500
cards.feature: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 p-8 rounded-2xl hover:bg-white/10 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4AF37] outline-none transition-all

principles: Parallax effects on scroll for images
Magnetic hover effects on primary buttons

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons for a more premium feel.

tasks: Configure Tailwind theme with the specified colors and fonts.
Set default text color to white.
Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the entire app (opacity 0.03).
Refactor 'Button' to match the 'primary' and 'outline' styles.
Create a 'ProductCard' with the specified hover effects (image zoom, border glow).
Build a 'Hero' section using the parallax image strategy.
Update Homepage with Bento grid layout for categories.
Redesign Product Detail Page with 'Zoom In' philosophy (large images, sticky details).
Style the Cart Drawer with glassmorphism.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large heading.
Avoid pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use #050505 or #0A0A0A.
Ensure all interactive elements have a visible focus state.
Images must have 'alt' tags for accessibility.
